translations: v．放屁：从肛门排放气体，通常伴有声音和气味。
· He farted loudly during the meeting.
他在会议期间放了个响屁。

sentences.sentence: The baby farted in his sleep.
sentences.translation: 这个婴儿在睡梦中放了屁。
他说，“我没做饭，我刚放了个屁。”

sentences.sentence: Tonight, she said "I know how to warm you up" and farted on me. FML.
sentences.translation: 可是今天，她说了“我知道怎么让你温暖”之后便朝我放了一个屁。
